maqras.text: 94|1|Ami tomara (kalyanara) babe tomara buku prasasta karai diya na'ine
94|2|arau ami tomara paraa tomara boja apasarana karaa na'ine
94|3|yi boja'i tomara pithi bhani pela'ichila
94|4|arau amiye'i tomara (maryada brd'dhira) babe tomara smaranaka samunnata karaicho.
94|5|Eteke dukhara lagate'i ache sukha
94|6|niscaya dukhara lagate'i ache sukha.
94|7|Eteke yetiya'i tumi arasara poraa tetiya'i kathora ibadatata atmaniyoga karaa.
94|8|Arau tomara pratipalakara prati gabhira manoyogi horaa.
95|1|Sapata tina arau yayatunara
95|2|sapata cina'i parbatara
95|3|sapata e'i niraapada nagarakhanara
95|4|niscaya ami manuhaka sarbottama gathanata srsti karaicho
95|5|tara pichata ami taka hinatagrasthasakalara hinatamata parainata karaicho
95|6|kerala se'isakala lokara bahirae yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche; te'omlokara babe ache aphuranta subha pratidana.
95|7|Eteke (he manara!) Iyara pichato kihe tomaka karmaphala dina samparke abisbasi karai tule
95|8|allahe'i bicarakasakalara majata sarbasraestha bicaraka nahayane barau
96|1|parha tomara pratipalakara namata, yiye srsti karaiche
96|2|te'om manuhaka alakbara paraa srsti karaiche.
96|3|Parha, karana tomara pratipalaka mahamahima.
96|4|Yijane kalamara sahayata siksa diche.
96|5|Te'om manuhaka ene siksa diche, yito manuhe jana nachila.
96|6|Bastarate, manuhe simalanghana karai thake.
96|7|Karana si nijake sbanirbharasila buli bharae.
96|8|Niscaya tomara pratipalakara ocarate'i pratyarartana.
96|9|Tumi taka dekha na'ine? Yiye nisedha karae.
96|10|Ejana bandaka, yetiya te'om chalata adaya karae.
96|11|Koraacona, yadi'o te'om hidayatara oparata pratisthita
96|12|athaba takbaraara nirdesa diye; (tathapi'o te'omka kenekai badha diye)
96|13|koraacona yadi si (nisedhakarai) asbikara karae arau mukha ghuraa'i laya
96|14|si najane neki, niscaya allahe dekhi ache
96|15|ketiya'o nahaya, yadi si birata nathake, tente niscaya ami taka agaculita dharai tani anima.
96|16|Michaliya, papisthara agaculi (kapala).
96|17|Eteke si nija paraisadaka mati anaka.
96|18|Anatipalame ami mati anima jahannamara kathora praharaisakalaka.
96|19|Ketiya'o nahaya, tumi tara anusarana nakaraiba. Arau tumi (tomara pratipalakaka) chajada karaa arau naikatya labha karaa.
97|1|Niscaya ami iyaka la'ilatula kbadarata aratirna karaicho
97|2|tumi ki janiba la'ilatula kbadara ki
97|3|la'ilatula kbadara ehejara mahatakaiyo sraestha.
97|4|Se'i raatita phiraistasakala arau rauha te'omlokara pratipalakara anumatikrame yaratiya sid'dhanta lai aratarana karae.
97|5|Santimaya se'i raati, phajarara abirbhara nohoraalaike (santi bistrta thake).
98|1|Ahale kitabasakalara majata yisakale kupharai karaiche arau musbaraikasakala, sihamtara ocarata suspasta pramana nahalaike sihamte birata thakibalai prastuta nachila.
98|2|Allahara taraphara paraa ejana raachula, yijane tilaraata karai sunaba paraitra patrasamuha
98|3|Ya’ta ache sathika bidhibad'dha bidhana.
98|4|Arau yisakalaka kitaba diya haichila sihamte bibhakta ha’la sihamtara ocarata suspasta pramana ahara pichata.

98|5|Arau sihamtaka kerala e'i nirdesa diya haichila ye, sihamte yena allahara ibadata karae te'omra babe'i yena dbinaka ekanistha karae arau yena chalata pratistha karae arau yakata pradana karae, arau e'itorae'i haiche sathika dbina.
98|6|Niscaya ahale kitabasakalara majara yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamta arau musbaraikasakala jahannamara ju'ita sthayibharae arasthana karaiba; e'omloke'i haiche nikrsta srsti.
98|7|Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau neka kama karaiche, te'omloke'i haiche srstira sraestha.

98|8|Te'omlokara pratipalakara ocarata te'omlokara puraskara ache sthayi jannata, yara talata nadisamuha prabahita, tata te'omloke cirakala thakiba. Allaha te'omlokara prati santusta arau te'omloke'o te'omra prati santusta. E'ito tara babe, yiye nija pratipalakaka bhaya karae.
99|1|Yetiya prabala kampanata prthiraikhana prakampita ha’ba
99|2|arau prthiraiye tara bhitarata thaka bojabora uliya'i diba
99|3|arau manuhe ka’ba, iyara ki ha’la
99|4|se'idina prthiraiye tara brttanta barnana karaiba
99|5|karana tomara pratipalake taka nirdesa diche
99|6|se'idina manuhe bhin bhin dalata ola'i ahiba yate sihamtaka sihamtara krtakarmabora dekhuraaba paraa yaya
99|7|eteke yiye anu paraimana satkama karaiche seya si dekhibalai paba.
99|8|Arau yiye anu paraimana asatkama karaiche seya'o si dekhibalai paba.
100|1|Sapata urdhbasbasata daurai yoraa ghomraasamuhara
100|2|yiborae ksurara aghatata phirainati urauraaya
100|3|yiborae prabhatakalata akramana karae
100|4|phalata sihamte iyara dbaraa dhuli urauraaya
100|5|arau iyara dbaraa satrau dalara abhyantarata soma'i parae.
100|6|Niscaya manuha tara pratipalakara prati atikai akrtajna
100|7|niscaya si e'i bisaye saksi
100|8|arau niscaya si dhana-sampadara lobhata prabala.
